name: Sliding Castle EX
description:
Controls: Z to dash. X to jump. Left and right arrows to move. Down arrow to reset, and up arrow to confirm.

The enhanced version of the original Sliding Castle made for the RNDGAME JAM II. Complete with bug fixes, redone art by Wekraptor, and 8 brand new levels!

Made by Malith and Wekraptor. Original art by Gabe-8-bit.
